text: tatha unhonne kaha ki jo in pashuon ke garbhon mein hai, vo hamaare purushon ke lie vishesh hai aur hamaaree patniyon ke lie varjit hai aur yadi murda ho, to sabhee usamen saajhee ho sakate[1] hain. allaah unake vishesh karane ka kuphal unhen avashy dega. vaastav mein, vah tatvagy ati gyaanee hai
